Home.title: Easy way to find your favorite anime
Home.description: Are you looking for an anime that you saw a long time ago in a video where a scene came out? or maybe you saw it on a tik-tok but couldn't find the name? Well, thanks to Anime Tracker you can find it by entering an image scene. Not only that, you will also be able to know what chapter it is about and much more useful information.

SearchUrl.title: Search for the anime using the url of an anime image scene
SearchUrl.search_button_title: Click on the magnifying glass to search

SearchIMG.title: Search for the anime using the image of an anime scene
SearchIMG.search_button_title: Click on the buttom to select an image

Help.title: How does it work
Help.description_part_one: Go to the section of the menu to ,search by url, click on the magnifying glass and paste your url (only image formats are accepted: png, jpeg, jpg) and then press enter or go to the search by image menu section, click on the button and a window will open for you to select a file and then press the send button.
Help.description_part_two: You will see that it starts to load and then the content obtained will be listed, and you will only have to select the one you want to see its information. You have both case in the following example video:
